text:
The standard [[crossbow]] of the [[Heirs of Dhakaan]] is a compact design employing superior alloys and sophisticated engineering. Its power is comparable to the [[SAC-15]] in a smaller and more streamlined package. The standard Aramâ€™kron is a [[heavy crossbow]] with a retractable bayonet. The name roughly translates to "Wrath of the Six" in the [[Goblin]] language.

[[Light crossbow|light crossbow]]s are rarely seen among the [[Kech Dhakaan|Heirs of Dhakaan]], though the [[Khesh'dar]] employ the [[Sar'ka]] [[hand crossbow]].
title: Aram'kron
